title: Pharma
cleaned_text:
Come Join Us at the Prescott Wellness Expo!

Learn The Risk will be meeting and greeting all weekend at the Hilton Garden Inn in downtown Prescott, April 1st through the 3rd. Come to here a special talk from our co-founder and President, Tina “I” on Saturday April 2nd at 12:30pm. At our booth, you will find discounted shirts,

opengraph.title: Pharma - Learn the Risk
opengraph.description: PHARMA: AN INDUSTRY THAT PUTS PROFITS BEFORE PATIENTS? The pharmaceutical industry is one of the largest moneymakers in the world, with more than a trillion dollars in profits every year. It’s an industry that heavily influences our healthcare system, yet, it only profits when people are sick. Many people don’t realize that there’s no money made […]
